koohiiStory1: In its infancy, a butterfly is protected by a cocoon, as it doesn´t yet have any power of its own.
koohiiStory2: During their infancy, children are often wrapped up tight like a cocoon (i.e. in those Snugli carriers) and supported by the muscle of their parents.
words:
幼い(おさない): very young, childish
幼児(ようじ): infant, baby, child
幼稚(ようち): infancy, childish, infantile
幼稚園(ようちえん): kindergarten
